attributes.action: Make the government provide more support for homeless people
attributes.background: Helpless people are being forced on to the streets through no fault of their own, in most cases they have paid tax for most of their life, and after being made redundant which can happen to anyone, are being forced to sleep in temperatures below freezing.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to support homeless people.
